name: In re ADOPTION OF Lori Ann BERNSTEIN. Appeal of Lawrence P. BERNSTEIN

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: In re ADOPTION OF Lori Ann BERNSTEIN. Appeal of Lawrence P. BERNSTEIN.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John M. Demcisak, Hatboro, for appellant.
Robert W. Suter, Doylestown, for appellees, A. Warren Allen, Jr., et ux.
casebody.head_matter:
410 A.2d 1251
In re ADOPTION OF Lori Ann BERNSTEIN. Appeal of Lawrence P. BERNSTEIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
John M. Demcisak, Hatboro, for appellant.
Robert W. Suter, Doylestown, for appellees, A. Warren Allen, Jr., et ux.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
